description: Subscribe to a camera image topic and perform object detection using a YOLO-based processing node. Input: /camera/image_raw. Output: bounding boxes and detection results.
expected_ros2_behavior: A ROS2 node using rclpy subscribing to /camera/image_raw and performing YOLO inference, publishing detection results on /detections.

directories.ros1_code: Contains ROS1 Python implementation with TODO placeholders for LLM completion.
directories.dockerfile: Dockerfile for building and running ROS1 environment.
